name: Boxomatic3000
description:
Sort tons of differently colored boxes into their correct containers to get tons of points! Don't make too many mistakes, or you lose!

Options for master, SFX, and music volumes as well as chromatic aberration!

NOTE: If you are playing in the browser, do NOT press the "Quit" button. If you do, restart the page to keep playing. I might make a browser version that doesn't have a quit button at some point.
